trans-unit.source: Enables a class to return an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> from the current context or position.
trans-unit.target: Permite que uma classe retornar um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> do contexto atual ou posição.

trans-unit.source: The `IHasXmlNode` interface provides an interface that enables a class to return an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> from the current context or position.
trans-unit.target: O `IHasXmlNode` interface fornece uma interface que permite que uma classe retornar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>do contexto atual ou posição.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: It is implemented by <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects that operate over classes that have <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes.
trans-unit.target: Ele é implementado por <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objetos que operam em classes que possuem <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>nós.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `XPathNavigator` object is created by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, you can use the <xref:System.Xml.IHasXmlNode.GetNode%2A> method to return the `XmlNode` representing the current position of the navigator.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o `XPathNavigator` objeto é criado por um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, você pode usar o <xref:System.Xml.IHasXmlNode.GetNode%2A>método para retornar o `XmlNode` representando a posição atual do navegador.</xref:System.Xml.IHasXmlNode.GetNode%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> for the current position.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> para a posição atual.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code uses `GetNode` to access a node the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is currently positioned on.
trans-unit.target: O código c# a seguir usa `GetNode` para acessar um nó de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>está atualmente posicionado.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> for the current position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""> </xref> para a posição atual.
